channel.title: Apache crashes
channel.description:
Any time any one views a page on my site, it puts this out in error.log [code] [Wed Jul 02 18:30:07 2008] [warn] pid file C:/xampp/apache/logs/httpd.pid overwritten -- Unclean shutdown of previous Apache run? [Wed Jul 02 18:30:08 2008] [notice] Apache/2.2.8 (Win32) DAV/2 mod_ssl/2.2.8 OpenSSL/0.9.8g mod_autoindex_color PHP/5.2.5 configured -- resuming normal operations [Wed Jul 02 18:30:08 2008] [notice] Server built: Jan 18 2008 00:37:19 [Wed Jul 02 18:30:08 2008] [notice] Parent: Created child process 5896 [Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Child process is running [Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Acquired the start mutex. [Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting 250 worker threads. [Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting thread to listen on port 443. [Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting thread to listen on port 80. [/code]
it still shows as being on in xampp control panel, though nothing loads then, so i have to hit the stop button two times, then hit start, thats the exact problem.
I tried disabling my firewall, I tried a fresh install, nothing is working, and I am at a loss. any help is appreciated.

item.title: Apache crashes
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Yea thats what it seems like. It is up now, go to the main, unmodded page, just hte normal xampp page, mixscape.info, then once you get there and hit a link, it will crash while loading the new page, and no other pages will load until i restart it.

Read full topic

item.title: Apache crashes
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

think 443 is https.

And it just gives that one error, then i have to hit the stop button two times and it shuts off then i hti start once and its back up, until some one views a page then it crashes again.

Read full topic

item.title: Apache crashes
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Any time any one views a page on my site, it puts this out in error.log

[Wed Jul 02 18:30:07 2008] [warn] pid file C:/xampp/apache/logs/httpd.pid overwritten -- Unclean shutdown of previous Apache run?
[Wed Jul 02 18:30:08 2008] [notice] Apache/2.2.8 (Win32) DAV/2 mod_ssl/2.2.8 OpenSSL/0.9.8g mod_autoindex_color PHP/5.2.5 configured -- resuming normal operations
[Wed Jul 02 18:30:08 2008] [notice] Server built: Jan 18 2008 00:37:19

[Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Child process is running

[Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting 250 worker threads.
[Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting thread to listen on port 443.
[Wed Jul 02 18:30:10 2008] [notice] Child 5896: Starting thread to listen on port 80.

it still shows as being on in xampp control panel, though nothing loads then, so i have to hit the stop button two times, then hit start, thats the exact problem.

I tried disabling my firewall, I tried a fresh install, nothing is working, and I am at a loss. any help is appreciated.
